function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of contagious diseases through medical data exchange","Impact":"Spread of diseases to healthcare professionals and other individuals","Mitigation":"Implement strict access control and encryption protocols","Technologies":"Asymmetric encryption, PGP keys, hashing algorithms","People":"Healthcare professionals, patients, data security experts","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, data security experts"},{"Description":"Tampering with medical data during exchange","Impact":"Compromised medical records, misdiagnosis, and incorrect treatment","Mitigation":"Use digital signatures for data integrity verification","Technologies":"Digital signatures, hashing algorithms, smart contracts","People":"Healthcare professionals, patients, data security experts","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, data security experts"}]}
